dialog.conversation1: <paragraph who = "Captain" text = "Captain: This isn't a game, you know. That ship has disturbed us too long and your team depends on your success."

paragraph.text: Captain: Be careful!, Chandra. This is a trap, get out of there now!
Chandra: We will see who is the trap for, this will be interesting. Estupid Kreatorians.
Chandra: Ready captain. I approach the ship.
